articles.title: ‘Don’t feel safe’: Crime wave in Aussie city
articles.description: A convenience store worker who was forced to run for her life while being robbed at knifepoint is one of many locals afraid of rising youth crime in the Queensland city of Townsville.
articles.content:

articles.title: San Francisco called 'lawless' after death of Bob Lee, but crime is down
articles.description: With a population of fewer than 1 million people, the California city has roughly a quarter of the number of homicides as similar-sized cities in the Midwest.

articles.title: Ben Ferencz: Last surviving Nuremberg prosecutor dies, aged 103
articles.description: Ben Ferencz was just 27 when he convicted 22 Nazi officials for war crimes and crimes against humanity.
articles.content:
The last surviving prosecutor from the post-World War Two Nuremberg trials has died aged 103.
